editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Dryer, Freezer, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven, Refrigerator, Trash compactor, Washer
editedFacts.rooms: Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Master bath, Office, Pantry, Recreation room, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription:
This is a FSBO (For Sale By Owner) listing...
 
For more information please contact the owner DIRECTLY at 727.204.1184 or email jb247@hotmail.com...
 
Built in 2002, and completely remodeled and renovated in 2010, with over $80k in additional custom upgrades...
 
Spanish Stucco design with clay barrel roof...
 
Split design floor plan with dual-unit central heat & air (each are less than 2 years old)...
 
Centrally located Gourmet kitchen with granite countertops & stainless appliances...
 
Full size Laundry Room w/ Washer & Driver located right off the Kitchen & Garage...
 
Large pantry with endless storage throughout -- you will run out of "stuff" before you run out of places to put it...
 
Custom designer paint with hand faux finish (by local renowned artist Deb Holliday), designer-grade fixtures & outlets, and Bali custom designer blinds...
 
Large Master Suite with his & hers walk-in closets, and reading nook w/ dual French Doors that open onto the Lanai...
 
Luxurious Master Bath with Whirlpool Tub & Custom Shower...
 
Home Office with custom built-in desk and shelving...
 
Entire house is pre-wired for Home Theater, 15 powered speakers and 6 TVs...
 
Multi-zone Alarm System w/ 8 Camera Surveillance System...
 
Over-sized 2 Car Garage (can accommodate 2 vehicles and a full-size Harley)...
 
GE 60-gallon heat pump hot water tank...
 
Circular Paver Driveway...
 
Located on a large (.26 acre) corner lot...
 
Large Guest (Mother-in-law) Suite / Gym with Wet Bar & built-in wine fridge...
 
12' Vaulted ceilings w/ 7 designer Ceiling Fans throughout...
 
Large 16" Ceramic & Limestone Tile, and Hardwood Floors...
 
Large wrap around Lanai...
 
Custom designed heated (Heat Pump) Pool w/ Travertine Stone Decking...

Tropical Lush Xeriscape Landscaping & Accent Lighting, Dual 65 Gallon Rain Barrels, and a walking path encircling the home...
 
Large cabana-style 3rd bath with giant walk-in shower located right off the pool...
 
Home Owner Association (HOA) Dues are LESS THAN $30 PER MONTH!
 
Walking distance to numerous restaurants in downtown Tierra Verde...
 
Numerous Marinas / Boat Slips available in the immediate area...
 
Just minutes from historic Fort DeSoto Beach, Easy highway access to St Petersburg, Tampa, Airports and surrounding areas....
 
Again, this is a FSBO (For Sale By Owner) listing...
 
For more information please contact the owner DIRECTLY at 727.204.1184 or email jb247@hotmail.com...
response.whatOwnerLoves: Location... Location... Location... Island Living at its Best!
